text.section:
A person may not:
Sell, distribute, or otherwise dispose of any drug, medicine, pharmaceutical preparation, or medicinal preparation by means of any public exhibition, entertainment, performance, or carnival, commonly known as a "medicine show" or "patent medicine show"; or
Put or cause to be put, in any way, any package, parcel, or sample of any drug or medicine:
In or on any part of any house, building, or yard without the consent of the owner or occupant; or
On any street or public highway.
